metadata.title: USN-4666-1 -- lxml vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that lxml incorrectly handled certain HTML. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4666-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-lxml - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.2 python-lxml - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.2 python-lxml-doc - 4.2.1-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
